name: Art Portfolio Vol. 1
description:
Forty classic pieces of Shadowrun art are collected in this portfolio. Each piece is large, printed on sturdy cardstock, and easily detachable, so each page can be its own poster. A must-own for any Shadowrun or even cyberpunk fan who wants to display some of the best art in RPG history. 

- Images span the entire history and include some high-profile artists such as Larry Elmore and Echo Chernik.
- Some images were selected through a fan-voting process, so the book reflects fan preferences and has their investment.
- With each page being a detachable poster, fans get a lot of variety and options for how they want to show their favorite side of Shadowrun!
